world_frame.description: Name of the coordinate frame in which to store the map. Will be used as the frame_id for ROS TF lookups.

thresholding_period.description: Time period controlling how often the map is thresholded. To disable thresholding, set it to a negative number [not recommended].

pruning_period.description: Time period controlling how often the map is pruned. To disable pruning, set it to a negative number.

publication_period.description: Time period controlling how often the map is published. To disable map publishing, set it to a negative number.

max_num_blocks_per_msg.description: Maximum number of blocks to transmit per wavemap map message. Used to control the maximum message size. Only works in combination with hash-based map data structures.

num_threads.description: Maximum number of threads to use. Defaults to the number of threads supported by the CPU.

logging_level.description: Minimum severity level for ROS logging messages to be logged. Defaults to "info".
